hero.title: Our Services
hero.description: We accompany you in your immigration procedures and administrative formalities with agile and effective solutions.

immigration.title: Immigration Procedures
immigration.subtitle: Comprehensive case management before the Immigration Office

items.title: CRUE Processing (EU NIE)
items.description: Registration in the Central Registry of Foreigners and obtaining the NIE for EU citizens and their family members.

items.title: EU Residence Card
items.description: Application and renewal of residence cards for family members of EU citizens residing in Spain.

items.title: Non-EU Family Members
items.description: Comprehensive processing of the residence card for family members of Spanish/EU citizens including marriages and civil partnerships.

items.title: Initial Residence Authorizations
items.description: Arraigo (social, labor, family, and vocational training), non-lucrative residence, student permits, and other initial authorizations.

items.title: Residence Renewals
items.description: We manage the renewal of your residence permit, whether it's the first renewal or subsequent ones.

items.title: Long-Term Residence
items.description: Application for long-term residence after 5 years of continuous legal residence in Spain.

items.title: Work Permit Modifications
items.description: Changes from student permit to work permit, between employer types, or changes in work activity.

items.title: Spanish Nationality
items.description: Comprehensive processing of applications for Spanish nationality by residence, including preparation of the file and interview.

items.title: Social Security Registration
items.description: Registration and changes in Social Security for employees and self-employed workers.

items.title: Apostille and Legalization
items.description: Legalization and apostille of documents for use in Spain or abroad.

items.title: Criminal Record
items.description: Obtaining criminal record certificates, both Spanish and from the country of origin.

items.title: Sworn Translations
items.description: Official sworn translations of legal documents for immigration and administrative procedures.
